document.title: Management of Spinal Cord Injuries - Case Study Part 2
document.section: Presenting Condition For background information go toManagement of Spinal Cord Injuries - Case Study Part 1
Day 1 - 2 Hours Post Injury ASIA Assessment - C4 ASIA A
Day 2 - 28 Hours Post Injury ASIA Assessment - C4 ASIA A
Day 3 - 72 Hours Post Injury ASIA Assessment - C4 ASIA B
Day 7 ASIA Assessment - C5 ASIA B
Week 5 ASIA Assessment - C5 ASIA C
Functional Assessment Spinal Cord Independence Measure (SCIM). To find out more about completing the SCIM check out thisvideo
